'''''A New Hope''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to return to the spot the player planted the seed in {{Quest|Waiting For Seeds to Sprout}} after one [[Daily Reset]].
